    • About Mike Wall


    The Love Ohio Living Team, founded and headquartered in Ohio, is one of the fastest growing real estate teams in the country — ranked by The Board of Realtors as the #1 Real Estate Team at eXp Realty is focused on dominating Cincinnati & Dayton

    The standard of The Love Ohio Living Team is to provide clients with the highest level of service through our innovative and client-centered team approach to selling homes. When you work with The Love Ohio Living Team gives you piece of mind with guarantees such as our Sold in 77 Program, 24-Month Love it or List it Guarantee, and more!
